item.title: Kafka Connect Resources
item.description: These are some resources I’m using to learn about Kafka Connect. Kafka Connect, is the integration API for Apache Kafka, with a bunch of connectors (for sources and sinks), and is configuration based. So, here are the resources: Videos From Zero to Hero with Kafka Connect Kafka Connect 101 Building Data Pipelines with Apache Kafka and Confluent Docker Compose examples Reddit - Docker Compose file for Kafka and Kafka Connect (and ZooKeeper) GH: robcowart/cp-kafka-connect-custom GH: confluentinc/kafka-workshop
